gist.headline: Tidying up the hive
gist.blurb: We're doing some spring cleaning in the test suite to keep everything buzzing smoothly.
gist.summary: Fixed test failures, updated VCR snapshots, and corrected type signatures in the auth system to improve CI reliability.
gist.impact: Ensures platform stability and smoother deployments for the development team.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy maintenance scene where the pollinations bee is organizing or checking off items. Represents getting the 'house in order' (tests passing).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a checklist with green checkmarks next to a stack of retro computer servers. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'ALL GREEN'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
